name: alist
description: AList is a file listing and multi-cloud storage management tool that supports object storage services like S3, WebDAV, and Google Drive. It lets users browse, preview, and share files with ease via a beautiful web UI.
features: Multi-Cloud Support: Connect S3, WebDAV, Google Drive, and more in one interface. Unified storage management.
File Browsing: Navigate all your cloud storage with a beautiful web UI. Elegant file exploration.
Media Preview: View images, videos, and documents directly in browser. No downloads needed.
Easy Sharing: Generate shareable links for files and folders quickly. Collaborate effortlessly.
Cross-Platform: Desktop and Android apps for accessing files anywhere. Your files, everywhere.
WebDAV Server: Mount your storage as a network drive on any device. Native file system integration.
Password Protection: Secure folders and files with password access. Control who sees what.
Offline Download: Queue downloads to your server for later retrieval. Save bandwidth and time.
